project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would include: the development of about 35 ranches; development and improvement of about 137 large, medium, and small-scale cattle markets and 5,500 miles of stock routes and 27 holding grounds; the modernization of one meat processing plant and the construction of two new ones; and the provision of related technical services, training and assistance for project preparation.
